summary: A hypnotherapist is caught up in the pursuit of a serial killer.
cast: Shirley Henderson|Goran Visnjic|Miranda Otto|Sophie Stuckey|Josh Richards|John Rogan|Claire Rushbrook|Lauren Gabrielle Volpert|Sarah Woodward|Corin Redgrave|Paddy Considine|Madison Smartt Bell|Stevie Nye|Joshua McGowan|Andrew French|Tony Denham|Tam Dean Burn|John Bett|Fiona Shaw|Shammi Aulakh|Gerald Lepkowski|Howard Lee|Colin Farrell|Andrew Woodall|Angus Wright|Greg Bennett|Assly Zandry|Don McCorkindale|Ruel Rowe|Patrick John Walton
title: Doctor Sleep
